channel.title: Version 5.5 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.5.3 (2022-11-10) Fixes [bug] tags: fix non-latin tag display on planks #378 5.5.2 (2022-11-08) Fixes [bug] theme: fix typo 'n 404.html #376 [bug] theme: allow menu items an' children t' be served by file:// protocol #375 5.5.1 (2022-11-07) Fixes [bug] theme: fix overflow'n issue wit' anchors an' tooltips #364 5.5.0 (2022-11-06) Enhancements [feature][change] theme: opt'mize plank board fer images #304 Fixes [bug] theme: fix context 'n render hooks #373 [bug] print: make canonical URL absolute #371
